Posts.EditableText:
Right-y-o.... Laptop's here, but the stupid people at work won't allow me to take it in and use it at breaks, so development will go slower than I expected. Still, much easier to do stuff on this laptop that my PC so I'm going to be on it a tad more.... Being able to develop something.

Unfortunately I've picked up a PHP job along the way here so I'll start my quest stuff after that - then it's onto the battle engine and perhaps an IFcomp game...

Thanks for your time...
